Elements.Name: analogBoost
Description: Holding the trigger down farther will make the boost faster.

Elements.Name: analogBoostDrain
Description: Using the Analog Boost also affects how fast it drains.

Elements.Name: rumble
Description: Adds a subtle rumble to using the boost.

Elements.Name: adaptiveTriggers
Description: Utilizes the Dualsense's Adaptive Triggers for boosting.

Elements.Name: lightbar
Description: Utilizes the Dualsense's Lightbars for multiple actions.

Elements.Name: modifiedSpeedCap
Description: Modifies the normal speed cap by increasing the top speed and decreasing the deceleration when going above top speed.

Elements.Name: accelerationMultiplier
Description: Increases the acceleration when boosting. It is completely unaffected in vanilla, so set it to 1 for a vanilla experience.

Elements.Name: trickBoostGain
Description: How much boost you gain from tricks

Elements.Name: startWithMinimumBoost
Description: Spawn in with no boost.

Elements.Name: enabled
Description: Enable the gameplay changes configured with the below options, the above options are not affected.

Elements.Name: boostDrain
Description: How fast the regular boost gauge drains

Elements.Name: additionalBoostDrain
Description: How fast the additional boost rings drain

Elements.Name: naturalBoostGain
Description: How fast you gain boost naturally

Elements.Name: additionalNaturalBoostGain
Description: How fast you gain boost for the additional boost rings.

Elements.Name: ringBoostGain
Description: How much boost you gain from rings

Elements.Name: combatBoostGain
Description: How much boost you gain from combat

Elements.Name: reigniteRatio
Description: What percentage of boost gauge you need to reignite the boost.
